title: #194: The Devil Is In The Detail - The Case of the Central Park Jogger
description:
Laura Richards, Jim Clemente and Lisa Zambetti discuss their thoughts and analysis with Lisa about the brutal rape of Trisha Meili in Central Park. We discuss the timeline and analyse the interrogations of the so-called "confession tapes."

#HerNameISTrishaMeili
